INSERT INTO account_stats(account_id, statuses_count, created_at, updated_at, last_status_at) VALUES (?, ?, now(), now(), now()) ON CONFLICT (account_id) DO UPDATE SET statuses_count = account_stats.statuses_count + ?, last_status_at = now(), updated_at = now() RETURNING id;
SELECT ? AS one FROM "account_domain_blocks" WHERE "account_domain_blocks"."account_id" = $? AND "account_domain_blocks"."domain" = $? LIMIT $?
SELECT ? AS one FROM "blocks" WHERE "blocks"."account_id" = $? AND "blocks"."target_account_id" = $? LIMIT $?
SELECT ? AS one FROM "conversation_mutes" WHERE "conversation_mutes"."account_id" = $? AND "conversation_mutes"."conversation_id" = $? LIMIT $?
SELECT ? AS one FROM "follows" WHERE "follows"."target_account_id" = $? LIMIT $?
SELECT ? AS one FROM "media_attachments" WHERE "media_attachments"."status_id" = $? LIMIT $?
SELECT ? AS one FROM "mentions" WHERE "mentions"."account_id" = $? AND "mentions"."status_id" = $? LIMIT $?
SELECT ? AS one FROM "mutes" WHERE "mutes"."account_id" = $? AND "mutes"."target_account_id" = $? AND "mutes"."hide_notifications" = $? LIMIT $?
SELECT ? AS one FROM "notifications" WHERE "notifications"."account_id" = $? AND "notifications"."activity_type" = $? AND "notifications"."activity_id" = $? AND "notifications"."type" = $? LIMIT $?
SELECT ? AS one FROM "statuses" WHERE "statuses"."uri" = $? AND "statuses"."id" != $? LIMIT $?
SELECT ? AS one FROM "statuses" WHERE "statuses"."uri" = $? LIMIT $?
SELECT ? AS one FROM "tombstones" WHERE "tombstones"."uri" = $? LIMIT $?

SELECT "accounts"."id" FROM "accounts" INNER JOIN "follows" ON "accounts"."id" = "follows"."account_id" INNER JOIN "users" ON "users"."account_id" = "accounts"."id" WHERE "follows"."target_account_id" = $? AND "accounts"."domain" IS ? AND (users.current_sign_in_at > ?) ORDER BY "accounts"."id" ASC LIMIT $?

SELECT "accounts"."id", "accounts"."username", "accounts"."domain", "accounts"."private_key", "accounts"."public_key", "accounts"."created_at", "accounts"."updated_at", "accounts"."note", "accounts"."display_name", "accounts"."uri", "accounts"."url", "accounts"."avatar_file_name", "accounts"."avatar_content_type", "accounts"."avatar_file_size", "accounts"."avatar_updated_at", "accounts"."header_file_name", "accounts"."header_content_type", "accounts"."header_file_size", "accounts"."header_updated_at", "accounts"."avatar_remote_url", "accounts"."locked", "accounts"."header_remote_url", "accounts"."last_webfingered_at", "accounts"."inbox_url", "accounts"."outbox_url", "accounts"."shared_inbox_url", "accounts"."followers_url", "accounts"."protocol", "accounts"."memorial", "accounts"."moved_to_account_id", "accounts"."featured_collection_url", "accounts"."fields", "accounts"."actor_type", "accounts"."discoverable", "accounts"."also_known_as", "accounts"."silenced_at", "accounts"."suspended_at", "accounts"."hide_collections", "accounts"."avatar_storage_schema_version", "accounts"."header_storage_schema_version", "accounts"."devices_url", "accounts"."suspension_origin", "accounts"."sensitized_at", "accounts"."trendable", "accounts"."reviewed_at", "accounts"."requested_review_at", "accounts"."indexable" FROM "accounts" WHERE LOWER("accounts"."username") != ? AND LOWER("accounts"."username") = ? AND LOWER("accounts"."domain") IS ? ORDER BY "accounts"."id" ASC LIMIT $?

SELECT "list_accounts"."account_id" FROM "list_accounts" WHERE "list_accounts"."list_id" IN (SELECT "lists"."id" FROM "lists" WHERE "lists"."account_id" = $? AND "lists"."exclusive" = $?) AND "list_accounts"."account_id" = $?

SELECT "lists"."id" FROM "lists" INNER JOIN "list_accounts" ON "lists"."id" = "list_accounts"."list_id" INNER JOIN "accounts" ON "accounts"."id" = "lists"."account_id" INNER JOIN "users" ON "users"."account_id" = "accounts"."id" WHERE "list_accounts"."account_id" = $? AND ("list_accounts"."follow_id" IS NOT ? OR "lists"."account_id" = $?) AND (users.current_sign_in_at > ?) ORDER BY "lists"."id" ASC LIMIT $?
SELECT "media_attachments".* FROM "media_attachments" WHERE "media_attachments"."status_id" = $? ORDER BY "media_attachments"."id" ASC

SELECT "mentions"."id", "mentions"."account_id" FROM "mentions" INNER JOIN "accounts" ON "accounts"."id" = "mentions"."account_id" WHERE "mentions"."status_id" = $? AND "mentions"."silent" = $? AND ?=? AND "accounts"."domain" IS ? ORDER BY "mentions"."id" ASC LIMIT $?

SELECT "preview_cards".* FROM "preview_cards" INNER JOIN "preview_cards_statuses" ON "preview_cards"."id" = "preview_cards_statuses"."preview_card_id" WHERE "preview_cards_statuses"."status_id" = $? ORDER BY "preview_cards"."id" ASC LIMIT $?
SELECT "settings".* FROM "settings" WHERE (thing_type is ? and thing_id is ?) AND "settings"."var" = $? ORDER BY "settings"."id" ASC LIMIT $?
SELECT "statuses".* FROM "statuses" WHERE "statuses"."deleted_at" IS ? AND "statuses"."id" = $? ORDER BY "statuses"."id" DESC LIMIT $?
SELECT "statuses".* FROM "statuses" WHERE "statuses"."deleted_at" IS ? AND "statuses"."uri" = $? ORDER BY "statuses"."id" DESC LIMIT $?
SELECT "tags".* FROM "tags" INNER JOIN "statuses_tags" ON "tags"."id" = "statuses_tags"."tag_id" WHERE "statuses_tags"."status_id" = $?
SELECT "user_ips".* FROM "user_ips" WHERE "user_ips"."user_id" = $? ORDER BY "user_ips"."user_id" ASC LIMIT $?
